Underweight: Choose nutrient-rich foods and seek professional advice for healthy weight gain.
Normal: Maintain your healthy lifestyle with a balanced diet and regular exercise.
Overweight: Focus on healthy eating, stay active, and seek personalized advice from a healthcare provider.
Obesity-1: Begin weight loss with a balanced diet, regular exercise, and personalized guidance from a healthcare provider.
Obesity-2: Consult a professional for a sustainable weight management plan, including lifestyle changes and medical options.
Obesity-3: Adopt a muiltidisciplinary approach with medical and lifestyle interventions to improve health and quality of life.
